GT.content: what is a border (bord) or an approach (aborder) once the indivisibility of the trait is no longer secure (assurée)? gift will always be w/out border
GT.linkedContent: what is a border (bord) or an approach (aborder) once the indivisibility of the trait is no longer secure (assurée)? gift will always be w/out border

GT.content: gift overruns border & suspends its relation to border, is beyond transgression
GT.linkedContent: gift overruns border & suspends its relation to border, is beyond transgression

EM.content: efficiency of system turns transgressions into “false exits”
EM.linkedContent: efficiency of system turns transgressions into “false exits”

POS.content: deconstruction not a transgression, that would re-enclose us, give us a hold on closure of metaphysics > “one is never installed w/in transgression, one never lives elsewhere, transgression implies that the limit is always at work”
POS.linkedContent: deconstruction not a transgression, that would re-enclose us, give us a hold on closure of metaphysics > “one is never installed w/in transgression, one never lives elsewhere, transgression implies that the limit is always at work”

ATIA.content: transgressal experience of limitrophy, trephō, trophē, trophos: to feed limit, train, nurse, make grow, thicken, fold, divide the line, multiply/increase limit’s figures [not efface the limit]
ATIA.linkedContent: transgressal experience of limitrophy, trephō, trophē, trophos: to feed limit, train, nurse, make grow, thicken, fold, divide the line, multiply/increase limit’s figures [not efface the limit]

PS.content: transgression of metaphysics always risks returning to it

RGE.content: sovereign operation, to affirm itself as transgression must conserve, confirm, what it exceeds
RGE.linkedContent: sovereign operation, to affirm itself as transgression must conserve, confirm, what it exceeds

RGE.content: Bataille designates (as never before) the transgressive relationship that links world of meaning to world of nonmeaning
RGE.linkedContent: Bataille designates (as never before) the transgressive relationship that links world of meaning to world of nonmeaning

WAP.content: to neglect Hegel’s functional letter (“Report”) [as parergonal] a failure to move beyond prestatist problematics of education > a refusal to identify borders, exterior, a refusal to transform and transgress
WAP.linkedContent: to neglect Hegel’s functional letter (“Report”) [as parergonal] a failure to move beyond prestatist problematics of education > a refusal to identify borders, exterior, a refusal to transform and transgress

C.content: inimitable ductus of pickpocket [idiom], repeating (transgression must be repeated to begin) > worst, most fatal of villainies: robbery/violation of tombs
C.linkedContent: inimitable ductus of pickpocket [idiom], repeating (transgression must be repeated to begin) > worst, most fatal of villainies: robbery/violation of tombs

TN.content: untouchable before vow of abstinence [cf. OG p. 109 spacing prior to prohibition of names]? a vow of abstinence requires promise of touch > touch haunting abstinence itself, intensifying transgression: unforgivable perjury at heart of interdict
TN.linkedContent: untouchable before vow of abstinence [cf. OG p. 109 spacing prior to prohibition of names]? a vow of abstinence requires promise of touch > touch haunting abstinence itself, intensifying transgression: unforgivable perjury at heart of interdict

TN.content: Nancy’s “transgression” close to Derrida’s “originary perjury as inevitable as  it is unforgivable”
TN.linkedContent: Nancy’s “transgression” close to Derrida’s “originary perjury as inevitable as it is unforgivable”

ATM.content: [re: giving to EL w/out restitution] excess that overflows language sets it into motion at moment of traversing it > this traversal is not transgression (passage of a sharply dividing limit) > metaphor of overflowing no longer fits—too linear [?]
ATM.linkedContent: [re: giving to EL w/out restitution] excess that overflows language sets it into motion at moment of traversing it > this traversal is not transgression (passage of a sharply dividing limit) > metaphor of overflowing no longer fits—too linear [?]

OG.content: Heidegger transgresses and contained (y est comprise) at same time in presence of logocentrism > his crossing-out (rature, kreuzweise Durchstreichung) of Being effaces presence of transcendental signified while keeping it legible: this last writing is a first writing (of an epoch), inasmuch as it de-limits onto-theology, metaphysics of presence, logocentrism > Heidegger must restore (provisionally) “transcendence” to Being to renounce project/word ontology [given risk of transgression becoming regression here, Derrida insists we go by way of Heidegger’s rigor alone]
OG.linkedContent: Heidegger transgresses and contained (y est comprise) at same time in presence of logocentrism > his crossing-out (rature, kreuzweise Durchstreichung) of Being effaces presence of transcendental signified while keeping it legible: this last writing is a first writing (of an epoch), inasmuch as it de-limits onto-theology, metaphysics of presence, logocentrism > Heidegger must restore (provisionally) “transcendence” to Being to renounce project/word ontology [given risk of transgression becoming regression here, Derrida insists we go by way of Heidegger’s rigor alone]

OG.content: complex layering of 3 violences re: proper names: 1) expropriation, repetition, déjà dédoublée, arche-writing, to give name it’s forbidden to pronounce, to name what’s never present, the unique [fire in CIN, Glas] 2) secret, protective, reparatory, “moral,” conceal names 3) the scene of proper names, reassuring seal of self-identity, refers to #1 and #2, empirical consciousness, common concept of violence, revealing name by effraction: evil, war, rape (system of moral law & transgression) [see TACT/ABSTINENCE]
OG.linkedContent: complex layering of 3 violences re: proper names: 1) expropriation, repetition, déjà dédoublée, arche-writing, to give name it’s forbidden to pronounce, to name what’s never present, the unique [fire in CIN, Glas] 2) secret, protective, reparatory, “moral,” conceal names 3) the scene of proper names, reassuring seal of self-identity, refers to #1 and #2, empirical consciousness, common concept of violence, revealing name by effraction: evil, war, rape (system of moral law & transgression) [see TACT/ABSTINENCE]

OG.content: language couples prohibition & transgression endlessly, point of nonreplacement doesn’t exist > that which is elusive in our indestructible & mortal desire
OG.linkedContent: language couples prohibition & transgression endlessly, point of nonreplacement doesn’t exist > that which is elusive in our indestructible & mortal desire

WBH.content: deconstruction not transgression of the Law, it is the Law: it is an affirmation, and affirmation is on side of Law: as soon as you affirm a desire, you perform something which is the Law, the Law says, “yes” (Law is not simply negative, that’s hard to understand)
WBH.linkedContent: deconstruction not transgression of the Law, it is the Law: it is an affirmation, and affirmation is on side of Law: as soon as you affirm a desire, you perform something which is the Law, the Law says, “yes” (Law is not simply negative, that’s hard to understand)

WBH.content: deconstruction is another way of writing Law, affirming new mode of Law, thus not a movement of transgression or liberation
WBH.linkedContent: deconstruction is another way of writing Law, affirming new mode of Law, thus not a movement of transgression or liberation
